articles.title: AI scammers target sports fans with celebrity deepfakes
articles.summary: Scammers are using artificial intelligence to create convincing fake images and videos of celebrities and athletes, targeting unsuspecting fans with sophisticated schemes

articles.title: Oakland AIs? The Ballers will be first professional sports team managed by AI
articles.summary: On Saturday, the Oakland Ballers of the independent Pioneer League will be the first team to be managed in-game by artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Oakland AIs? The Ballers will be first professional sports team managed by AI

articles.title: Timing Is Everything For This Niche Chipmaker
articles.summary: Surging demand for timing chips for artificial intelligence data centers and other applications has been the driver of SiTime stock.

articles.title: Power politics: How electricity costs are shaping this year’s elections
articles.summary: By David Wright, CNN (CNN) — America’s aging power grid has faced strain for years, exacerbated by severe weather events, an explosion of data centers and the demand created by artificial intelligence. Now, electricity is emerging as a top issue on the campaign trail. Campaigns in this fall’s races for New Jersey and Virginia governors,

articles.title: Tesla Shareholders to Vote on xAI Investment in November
articles.summary: Tesla Inc. shareholders will vote in November to decide if the electric carmaker should invest in Elon Musk’s closely held artificial intelligence startup, xAI.
articles.translated_title: Tesla Shareholders to Vote on xAI Investment in November

articles.title: Tesla floats new pay plan for Musk that would expand his voting power
articles.summary: Tesla will also ask shareholders to vote on whether the automaker should invest in Musk's artificial intelligence company, xAI.
articles.translated_title: Tesla floats new pay plan for Musk that would expand his voting power

articles.title: Broadcom shares rally on new AI deal, CEO's assurance
articles.summary: Broadcom shares jumped 7% in premarket trading on Friday, as an upbeat outlook for artificial intelligence revenue and CEO Hock Tan's pledge to stay on for five more years reassured investors betting on the chipmaker's custom silicon strategy.
